submodelElements.description: Indicates the current operational status of the screwing taks
Collection designed to include bit data (length and diameter)
SMC for containing all depth-related properties

value.description: Minimum depth of the drilled or screwed hole, measured in millimeters.
Maximum depth of the drilled or screwed hole, measured in millimeters.

submodelElements.description: SMC for containing all torque-related properties

value.description: The minimum torque value applied during the tightening process, measured in Newton-meters.
The maximum torque value applied during the tightening process, measured in Newton-meters.

submodelElements.description: SMC for containing metrics (time related to cost).

value.description: Cost in terms of time (ms) for each screw to be placed.
SMC designed for containing all screwing points for the setup
Collection containing all the coordinates for the setup.
Coordinate of screw setup in the X axis
Coordinate of screw setup in the Y axis
Coordinate of screw setup in the Z axis
This collection contains the limits that SetupCoordinates must follow.
Maximum X coordinates limit measured in milimeters (mm)
Minimum X coordinates limit measured in milimeters (mm)
Maximum Y coordinates limit measured in milimeters (mm)
Minimum Y coordinates limit measured in milimeters (mm)
Maximum Z coordinates limit measured in milimeters (mm)
Minimum Z coordinates limit measured in milimeters (mm)
